description: Amazing One Bedroom apartment with huge kitchen. Steps to Prospect Park, plenty of subway options. Great for people travelling with Pets.
name: Huge 1 Bed near Prospect Park
review: This was a great place. Close to public transit in a really nice, quiet building. The apartment is really big and has a big TV with cable TV. A real treat! Alexey was great and a good person to stay with. I would definitely recommend his house.
